member.name: DML_BUFFER_ARRAY_BINDING
member.summary: Specifies a resource binding that is an array of individual buffer bindings.

member.name: DML_BUFFER_ARRAY_BINDING.BindingCount
member.summary: The number of individual buffer ranges to bind to this slot. This field determines the size of the Bindings array.

member.name: DML_BUFFER_ARRAY_BINDING.Bindings
member.summary: The individual buffer ranges to bind.
